Client.Name: Hebei Maya Film and Television Co., Ltd.

Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Hebei Maya Film and Television Co., Ltd. was founded in February 2005, is a collection of film and animation original, stereoscopic film and television high technology services, VR virtual reality application services as one of the specialized film and television companies. At present, it has a technical research and development team of more than 40 people with doctoral and master's degrees and a backbone team of more than 100 people in film and television special effects production; more than 2,000 square meters of research and development production sites; AIAMOE and other registered brands.

In 2010, the company was recognized by the Ministry of Culture as an animation enterprise; the company has created and produced a series of high-level animation and film and television works by virtue of its superb design and production capabilities. Film and television post-production works include: “Police Story 2013”, “RoboCop 2014”, “Big Little Lies 3” and so on.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Mainly film and animation video, stereoscopic film and television high technology service data, VR virtual reality application service data, etc.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America, South America, Europe, Australia (continent)
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: HTTP or FTP server, Shipping hard drives
